name: General Motors Corporation, Appellant, v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review
name_abbreviation: General Motors Corp. v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: General Motors Corporation, Appellant, v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review.
attorneys: John G. Wayman, with him Scott F. Zimmerman, and Reed, Smith, Shaw & McGlay, for appellant.
Paul A. Simmons, for claimant, appellee.
Sydney Reuben, Assistant Attorney General, for Unemployment Compensation Board of Review, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
General Motors Corporation, Appellant, v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review.
Argued September 29, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
John G. Wayman, with him Scott F. Zimmerman, and Reed, Smith, Shaw & McGlay, for appellant.
Paul A. Simmons, for claimant, appellee.
Sydney Reuben, Assistant Attorney General, for Unemployment Compensation Board of Review, appellee.
November 14, 1967:
